newsitem.title: ALBANIA: One dead, eight hurt in Albania gangster shoot-out.
newsitem.headline: One dead, eight hurt in Albania gangster shoot-out.

text.p: A 65-year-old woman died in crossfire and eight people were wounded when gangsters from rival bands exchanged gunfire in the Albanian port city of Durres on Thursday, the interior ministry said.
A ministry statement quoted on television said police had identified those responsible for the shooting and were hunting them down.

A series of violent crimes has shocked the Balkan nation during the summer. Last month, two policemen brothers were killed in an ambush, while in July a police chief and a prison chief were shot dead, allegedly by gangsters.
